alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 21 at 9:34PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR LUCAS WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 9 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 5 INCHES, 70 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN ORANGE/BLUE/WHITE UNDER-COAT, GRAY ADIDAS SHOES WITH RED BOTTOMS. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR ARIANA WRIGHT, WHITE, FEMALE, 8 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 5 INCHES, 70 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN PURPLE UNDER-COAT, BROWN BOOTS WITH A CAMO LEAF TOP. THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR JONATHAN WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 11 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 8 INCHES, 80 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND WEARING ALL GREEN OUTERWEAR, LL BEAN BRIGHT BLUE UNDER-COAT, GRAY ADIDAS SHOES WITH RED BOTTOMS. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR JONATHAN ALEXANDER WRIGHT, WHITE, MALE, 40 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 9 INCHES, 170 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND POSSIBLY WEARING A GREEN JACKET OR HOODIE, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM AT 3:45 PM ON DECEMBER 20, 2021 NEAR CR 366 AND FM 2676 IN HONDO, TX ON FOOT. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE AT 8 3 0 7 4 1 6 1 5 3. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS MEDINA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE AT 8 3 0 7 4 1 6 1 5 3
